quotes.quote: Compassion and tolerance are not a sign of weakness, but a sign of strength.
Love, hope, fear, faith - these make humanity; These are its sign and note and character.
The greatness of a man is measured by the way he treats the little man. Compassion for the weak is a sign of greatness.
The tendency to whining and complaining may be taken as the surest sign symptom of little souls and inferior intellects.
When two people decide to get a divorce, it isn't a sign that they "don't understand" one another, but a sign that they have, at last, begun to.
Racism is a sign of ignorance, in my opinion. It's people who haven't been anywhere, haven't seen the world.
The greatest sign of success for a teacher... is to be able to say, "The children are now working as if I did not exist.
Conservation may be a sign of personal virtue, but it is not a sufficient basis for a sound, comprehensive energy policy.
There is no surer sign of decay in a country than to see the rites of religion held in contempt.
When suffering comes, we yearn for some sign from God, forgetting we have just had one.
Frustration is a sign I am acting independently. The more you try your own way, the tighter the doors will stay closed.
You can be stern and forthright, and that's my management style, but when you lose it totally, that's a sign of weakness.
We must interpret a bad temper as a sign of inferiority.
A great many people think that polysyllables are a sign of intelligence and refinement so they think they will impress others with their command of obscure words.
Genius worship is the inevitable sign of an uncreative age.
The true sign of intelligence is not knowledge but imagination.
Sanctions are a sign of irritation; they are not the instrument of serious policies.
A dark cloud is no sign that the sun has lost his light; and dark black convictions are no arguments that God has laid aside His mercy.
Responsibilities are given to him on whom trust rests. Responsibility is always a sign of trust.
Factions are a sign of illness in a party.
Contradiction is not a sign of falsity, nor the lack of contradiction a sign of truth.
Errors of taste are very often the outward sign of a deep fault of sensibility.
Respect for another man's opinion is worthy. It is the realization that any opinion is valuable, for it is the sign of a rational being.
The triumph of persuasion over force is the sign of a civilized society.
When a man fell into his anecdotage it was a sign for him to retire from the world.
It is a sign of contraction of the mind when it is content, or of weariness. A spirited mind never stops within itself; it is always aspiring and going beyond its strength.
It is the sign of a great mind to dislike greatness, and to prefer things in measure to things in excess.
The surest sign that intelligent life exists elsewhere in the universe is that it has never tried to contact us.
If a cluttered desk is a sign of a cluttered mind, of what, then, is an empty desk a sign?
